fields.Title of Presentation: A Refinement of Michener's Example Classification
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: 37th Annual Conference of the North American Chapter of the International Group for the Psychology of Mathematics Education
fields.Sponsoring Organization: North American Chapter of the International Group for the Psychology of Mathematics Education
fields.Description/Abstract:
In this paper we propose a refinement of Michener’s (1978) well-known example classification based on data from university mathematicians. The refinement takes into account the mathematician’s perspective on the role of examples in doing mathematics. More 
specifically, our work provides insight into the ways in which mathematicians talk about using examples in their scholarly work and their work with students. The proposed classification has the potential to inform our work as teachers as we strive to create opportunities to engage students in authentic mathematical work.
